Text: The Qatari efforts underscore the frustration of key Deutsche Bank backers after the shares lost about 70% of their value during Achleitner's time as chairman.
Effect: The Qatari efforts underscore the frustration of key Deutsche Bank backers after the shares lost about 70% of their value
Sentence: <e2>The Qatari efforts underscore the frustration of key Deutsche Bank backers after the shares lost about 70% of their value</e2> during <e1>Achleitner's time as chairman.</e1>
